name: Mats Erdkamp
description: Erdkamp has lead multiple innovative companies in the AI and blockchain space. He is a serial entrepreneur and has been involved in the development of several successful startups. Erdkamp is a strong believer in the potential of blockchain technology and is passionate about the future of the AI industry.

name: Nikki Mureau
description: Mureau has a passion in leadership and management. She is responsible for the day-to-day operations of the company and is a strong believer in the potential of blockchain technology. Mureau has a background in business management for over 10 years.

name: Davide Stefani
description: Stefani is responsible for the financial management of the company. He has a background in finance from the school of business in Milano and has been working in the financial industry for over 10 years. Stefani is a strong believer in the potential of blockchain technology and is passionate about the future of the AI industry.

name: Joris Lodewijks
description: Focusing on the technical side of the business, Lodewijks is responsible for the development of the platform and the technical infrastructure. He has a background in software development and has been working in the online gaming industry for over 10 years. Lodewijks cares about user experience and has a strong interest in the blockchain technology.

name: Thijs de Koning
description: Ethical issues are a major concern in the AI industry. De Koning is responsible for the ethical development of the platform and the AI technology. He has a background in philosophy and has been working in the AI industry for over 10 years. De Koning is a strong believer in the potential of AI technology and is passionate about the future of the AI industry.
